Text:
I haven't watched it yet but I checked the quality picture and sound look good.  Thanks so much.

IMBD rated 8.4

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117293/

I watched it and have to comment as this was incredibly heartwrenching.  The main program was a little bit slow in parts but I'm glad I watched the whole program.  The Revelations (part II) was much better as far as pace.  The story itself is shocking and down right scary. It makes me thankful I don't live in that part of the counrty. I much prefer the "lunatics" in Los Angeles.
